abstract: John Sterling and Suzyn Waldman will likely be back in the booth.
snippet: John Sterling and Suzyn Waldman will likely be back in the booth.
lead_paragraph: ST. LOUIS - The Yankees extended their contract with the radio station WCBS 880 to broadcast their games through the 2012 season, meaning that the announcers John Sterling and Suzyn Waldman will most likely come back in their same roles.

headline.main: Yankees Extend Radio Contract With WCBS
